com.limelight.videosdk.utility

Class Thumbnail

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.limelight.videosdk.utility.Thumbnail

  • public class Thumbnail
extends java.lang.Object
    This class helps in loading thumbnails associated with the channels and media. It decodes and loads the images in background as decoding bitmaps in UI thread causes OutOfMenory.
    Author:
    kanchan
